text: Penicillium hetheringtonii is a species of the genus of Penicillium which is named after A.C. Hetherington.UniProt This species was first isolated from beach soil in Land's End Garden in Treasure Island, Florida in the United States. Penicillium hetheringtonii produces citrinin and quinolactacin. ==Further reading== * * ==References== hetheringtonii Category:Fungi described in 2010
title: Penicillium hetheringtonii
